contentList.content: The Sentinel is a formidable warrior class, specializing in shield-based combat and protection tactics. Sentinels are the steadfast guardians of the battlefield, utilizing their shields not just as defensive tools, but as weapons and strategic assets.

The Bulwark Sentinel is a subclass specializing in the mastery of dual-shield tactics, becoming an impenetrable fortress on the battlefield. Bulwark Sentinels focus on maximizing defensive capabilities
Gain immunity to disease and resistance to poison and radiant damage.
Gain immunity to the frightened condition.
As a bonus action, enter a stance, granting +2 to AC until the end of your next turn. Useable once per combat.
As a bonus action, enter a stance, granting +4 to AC until the end of your next turn. Useable once per combat.
Allies within [1] of you gain a [2] bonus to their AC.
You are proficient in shielded combat. Your shields act as weapons when unarmed, dealing [1] damage.
Attack an enemy with your shield, dealing Bludgeoning damage.
Wielding a shield provides an additional [1] bonus to AC
An ally of your choosing gains +3 bonus to their AC until the end of their sixth turn.
Bolster the resolve of a friendly creature. It gains an additional 16 Temporary Hit Points
